item.title: Ansible on Vagrant - skipping: no hosts matched
item.description: I have some Ansible roles to configure my vps, Raspberry Pi, etc. I like to test them before I broke something on my real, not clustered machines - I use Vagrant for that. But with it I had one problem - in playbooks I define hosts as groups of severs ex. web for my vps: - hosts: web gather_facts: True sudo: True ...
